Package com.microsoft.band.sensors

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    BandAccelerometerEvent
    A sensor event with acceleration data
    BandAccelerometerEventListener
    Listener for receiving acceleration events from a Microsoft Band
    BandAltimeterEvent
    A sensor event with altimeter data (V2 Only)
    BandAltimeterEventListener
    Listener for receiving altimeter events from a Microsoft Band (V2 Only)
    BandAmbientLightEvent
    A sensor event with ambient light data (V2 Only)
    BandAmbientLightEventListener
    Listener for receiving ambient light events from a Microsoft Band (V2 Only)
    BandBarometerEvent
    A sensor event with barometer data (V2 Only)
    BandBarometerEventListener
    Listener for receiving barometer events from a Microsoft Band (V2 Only)
    BandCaloriesEvent
    A sensor event with calories data
    BandCaloriesEventListener
    Listener for receiving calorie events from a Microsoft Band
    BandContactEvent
    A sensor event with band contact data
    BandContactEventListener
    Listener for receiving contact events from a Microsoft Band
    BandDistanceEvent
    A sensor event with distance data
    BandDistanceEventListener
    Listener for receiving distance events from a Microsoft Band
    BandGsrEvent
    A sensor event with galvanic skin response data (V2 Only)
    BandGsrEventListener
    Listener for receiving galvanic skin response events from a Microsoft Band (V2 Only)
    BandGyroscopeEvent
    A sensor event with gyroscope and acceleration data
    BandGyroscopeEventListener
    Listener for receiving gyroscope events from a Microsoft Band
    BandHeartRateEvent
    A sensor event with heart rate data
    BandHeartRateEventListener
    Listener for receiving heart rate events from a Microsoft Band
    BandPedometerEvent
    A sensor event with pedometer data
    BandPedometerEventListener
    Listener for receiving pedometer events from a Microsoft Band
    BandRRIntervalEvent
    A sensor event with RR interval data (V2 Only)
    BandRRIntervalEventListener
    Listener for receiving RR interval events from a Microsoft Band (V2 Only)
    BandSensorEvent
    Base sensor event for all band sensor event types
    BandSensorManager
    Manager for subscribing and unsubscribing to a Microsoft Band's sensor data through Microsoft Health's band communication service
    BandSkinTemperatureEvent
    A sensor event with skin temperature data
    BandSkinTemperatureEventListener
    Listener for receiving skin temperature events from a Microsoft Band
    BandUVEvent
    A sensor event with UV data
    BandUVEventListener
    Listener for receiving UV events from a Microsoft Band
    HeartRateConsentListener
    Listener for receiving whether heart rate consent is given or denied
  • Enum Summary 
    Enum Description
    BandContactState
    An enumeration of band contact states
    GsrSampleRate
    Enumeration of sample rates for galvanic skin response subscriptions
    HeartRateQuality
    Enumeration of heart rate quality states
    MotionType
    Enumeration of movement modes
    SampleRate
    Enumeration of sample rates for accelerometer and gyroscope subscriptions
    UVIndexLevel
    Enumeration of band uv index levels
